short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The KhanHack Extension Used To View All Answers Easily!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the KhanHack, an extension which shows you the answers to lessons and any type of quiz on the official non-affiliated Khan Academy® website, its simplistic UI design lets you clearly see the answers to problems and cheat without having to actually do the problems and quizzes at all. This extension works by grabbing the answers that are sent from the server and putting them on the awesome interface for you to see!

How to use:
1. Simply install the extension.
2. Purchase the cheap subscription.
3. Go to any assignment and the hack/cheat script will activate.
4. Then the KhanHack will display all of the quiz answers in the top right hack menu.
5. Have fun flying though your lessons!!! ✌️

Note: The KhanHack will not work if you are already in a lesson and you choose to activate it, if you do you must reload the page and activate it then before you get into any lessons or quizzes. Also the answers are displayed in proceeding order so you may have to sort through the whole quiz's answers to find the one for your question.

If you have any issues feel free to contact the developers in the KhanHack Discord -> (https://discord.gg/N5SCTJ8wm6)

Disclaimer: KhanHack is an unofficial tool and is not endorsed by or affiliated with any educational institution, including Khan Academy™. All trademarks belong to their respective owners. Khan Academy™ is a trademark of Khan Academy® Inc.
